name: Furry Sex: Poker 🃏♥️
description:
Furry Sex: Poker  is a dating-sim-styled game where you have to beat your opponents in poker. Watch both your cards and your opponents carefully in order to determine which move should you do next. Your best bet would be on concentrating on one enemy per game. Once you beat one, there is an animated Live 2D sex scene in the Galley waiting for you.

Beat all of your opponents in poker to open all the animated scenes from the galley and be the best poker player at the table!

Features:
- a variety of different card set-ups
- six sexy and skillful opponents
- animated Live 2D sex scenes
